From: (USANYS)"
To:' "< >, "Miller, Michael" 
Cc: "I 
)" 
 >, "Weingarten, Reid" "'Martin G. 
Weinberg" -  owlmgw@att.net>, "Scavelli, Michael" mscavelli®Steptoe.com>, "Meade, Jason" 
<jmeade®Steptoe.com> 
Subject: RE: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19-CRIM-00490 (S.D.N.Y.) 
Date: Wed, 21 Aug 2019 02:32:17 +0000 
Mr. Miller, 
Per email, I will be the point of contact at the SDNY USAO for Touhy requests related to Jeffrey Epstein. 
Thank you, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
86 Chambers Street, Third Floor 
New York, New York 10007 
Telephone: 
Facsimile: 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 8:45 PM 
To: Miller, Michael 
Cc: >; Weingarten, Reid 
; 'Martin G. Weinberg' <owlmgw@att.net>; Scavelli, Michael <mscavelli@Steptoe.com>; 
Meade, Jason <jmeade@Steptoe.com>; (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19-CRIM-00490 (S.D.N.Y.) 
Mike, 
Consistent with the email sent by of our Civil Division on August 13, 2019, your August 20, 2019, requests for 
disclosure made pursuant to the Department of Justice's Touhy regulations will be handled by AUSA of 
our Civil Division, copied here. Please note that in light of the death of the defendant and in anticipation of the entry of 
the proposed order of nolle prosequi, no further productions will be made in the context of the criminal case of United 
States v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490. 
Separately, we are not able to accept service of any materials on behalf of entities separate from this Office. 
thank you, 
From: Miller, Michael • 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 11:42 
To: 
Cc: 
Ma; 
>; 
Weingarten, Reid 
; 'Martin G. Weinberg' <owlmgwPatt.net>. Scavelli, Michael 
<mscavelli@Steptoe.com>.
EFTA00032389

Meade, Jason <jmeader@Steptoe.com>
Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19-CRIM-00490 (S.D.N.Y.) 
Please find attached correspondence for your attention. We intend to serve these requests separately on the 
MCC and the FBI, but are providing you with copies of all three letters as a courtesy. If you are willing to accept 
service for all three, we will not otherwise serve them. 
Mike 
Michael C. Miller 
Partner 
+1 212 506 3955 direct l  +1 917 349 9129 mobile 
1 
+1 212 506 3950 fax 
Steptoe 
Steptoe & Johnson LLP 
1114 Avenue of the Americas 
I 
New York, NY 10036 
www.steptoe.com 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the law firm Steptoe & Johnson LLP that may be confidential andfor privileged. If you 
are not the intended recipient, please do not read. copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the 
sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message. 
EFTA00032390
